yaak.agent.communication.event
Class CommunicationEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      yaak.agent.event.AgentEvent
          yaak.agent.communication.event.CommunicationEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CommunicationEvent
extends AgentEvent

CommunicationEvent provides infomation for objects that register as CommunicationListener objects.
